hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT JOB_ID, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_SERVICE, CDDN_PROJECT_CODE, CDDN_CARRIER_CODE, CDDN_CARRIER_NAME, CDDN_STATION_CODE, CDDN_STATION_NAME, CDDN_USE_FLAFG, CDDN_USE_TIME, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, REC_VER FROM EB_CDDN WHERE 1=1 <<AND JOB_ID LIKE :jobId>> <<AND PRODUCT_ID LIKE '%'||:productId||'%'>> <<AND PRODUCT_SERVICE LIKE :productService>> <<AND CDDN_PROJECT_CODE LIKE :cddnProjectCode>> <<AND CDDN_CARRIER_CODE LIKE :cddnCarrierCode>> <<AND CDDN_CARRIER_NAME LIKE :cddnCarrierName>> <<AND CDDN_STATION_CODE LIKE :cddnStationCode>> <<AND CDDN_STATION_NAME LIKE :cddnStationName>> <<AND CDDN_USE_FLAFG LIKE :cddnUseFlafg>> <<AND CDDN_USE_TIME > :cddnUseTimeFrom>> <<AND CDDN_USE_TIME <= :cddnUseTimeTo + 1>> <<AND CREATOR LIKE :creator>> <<AND CREATE_TIME > :createTimeFrom>> <<AND CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeTo + 1>> <<AND MODIFIER LIKE :modifier>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME > :modifyTimeFrom>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeTo + 1>> <<AND REC_VER LIKE :recVer>> order by product_id asc ${queryPlanDefinedSql} ${queryPlanSortSql}
